sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 28, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Saturday 9:30am surprisingly firm for skate after yesterday’s 57°. Starting to soften up my last few laps. Very firm block ice along north/south section along driving range. Classic tracks looked good in most sections. Hope it makes it until next weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 8 chairlifts, Space Worm conveyor and the Rope Tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were groomed and tracked on Friday.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: A light snow is in the air and it looks like a nice ski day is in store. The loose wet snow from yesterday transformed to frozen snow early this morning. The Grooming Crew was out all night grooming many runs two times to ensure the best possible conditions today after the thaw to freeze. Please be aware that firm and icy conditions could be encountered off of the groomed surfaces. NASTAR Racing today on Birch Run from 12:30 to 2:30 p.m. No NASTAR Racing tomorrow due to the Head-2-Head Race. The soup of the day is Navy Bean and Ham. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
